Detailed Description

This file contains the code for dynamic scheduling with Constraint Programming.

CP is one of the schedulers develop in DS3. The Constraint Programming model is executed after every frame (job) is generated. The obtained schedule is stored in a table and then used as the tasks become ready for execution.

Creates a schedule using the Constraint Programming model.

Parameters
env_timeCurrent time of the simulation environment
P_elemsInstances of processing elements in the SoC configuration generated in the simulation environment
resource_matrixAll processing elements in the SoC configuration
domain_applicationsApplications under consideration for workload generation
generated_jobsInstances of applications (jobs) currently being executed in the system
